name: AutoPager -- Pagination hidden
description: This style removes AutoPager's "related searches" crap, the page splitting, but keeps the "Loading..." text message. In addition, it will get rid of pagination on sites like Google and UserStyles. I'll add in more pagination removal rules if anyone requests
additional_info:
0.3  -- more
0.2  -- added !important to display: none;
0.11 -- Added a pagination rule for webupd8.org.
0.1  -- Initial release.

Current pagination rules:
userstyles.org
google.com (and other domains, should be international)
webupd8.org
